clinical_study.brief_title: Immunogenicity and Safety Study of GSK Biologicals' Herpes Zoster Vaccine With Various Formulations in Adults >= 50 Years
clinical_study.official_title: Immunogenicity and Safety Study of Different Formulations of GSK Biologicals' Herpes Zoster Vaccine 1437173A When Administered Twice in Adults Aged 50 Years and Older

brief_summary.textblock: The goal of this randomized observer-blind trial is to further refine the formulation of vaccines containing GSK1437173A in older adults by comparing the cellular and humoral immune responses and the safety profiles of the different formulations.

primary_outcome.measure: Cell mediated immune response (CMI) in terms of frequencies of CD4 T cells specific for VZV antigens

secondary_outcome.measure: Cell-mediated immunity (CMI) in terms of frequencies of CD4 T cells specific for varicella-zoster virus (VZV) antigens
CMI in terms of frequencies of CD8 T cells specific for VZV antigens
Occurrence, intensity and relationship to vaccination of solicited adverse events (AEs)
Occurrence, intensity and relationship to vaccination of unsolicited AEs
Occurrence and relationship to vaccination of all serious AEs (SAEs)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Month 0 until 12 months following the last vaccination (Month 14)

secondary_outcome.measure: Occurrence and relationship to vaccination of all of all new onsets of autoimmune diseases (NOADs)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from Month 0 until 12 months following the last vaccination (Month 14)

secondary_outcome.measure: Occurrence of suspected cases of Herpes Zoster (HZ)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from Month 0 until 12 months following the last vaccination (Month 14)

secondary_outcome.measure: Haematological (complete blood count e.g. red blood cells, white blood cells and haemoglobin) and biochemical (e.g. creatine, liver enzymes and total protein) parameters Month 0
Haematological (complete blood count e.g. red blood cells, white blood cells and haemoglobin) and biochemical (e.g. creatine, liver enzymes and total protein) parameters Month 2
Haematological (complete blood count e.g. red blood cells, white blood cells and haemoglobin) and biochemical (e.g. creatine, liver enzymes and total protein) parameters Month 3

intervention.description: 2 vaccinations at Months 0 and 2 with GSK1437173A (different formulations)
2 vaccinations at Months 0 and 2 with placebo
